ERROR.error: The html element should have a lang or xml:lang attribute which describes the language of the document.
ERROR.full_text: [HTMLCS] ERROR|WCAG2AA.Principle3.Guideline3_1.3_1_1.H57.2|html||The html element should have a lang or xml:lang attribute which describes the language of the document.|<html><head></head><body>...</body></html>

ERROR.error: This element has a role of "button" but does not have a name available to an accessibility API. Valid names are: element content.
ERROR.full_tag: <paper-icon-button icon="search" class="style-scope traffic-incidents x-scope paper-icon-button-0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-disabled="false">...</paper-icon-button>
ERROR.full_text: [HTMLCS] ERROR|WCAG2AA.Principle4.Guideline4_1.4_1_2.H91.Paper-icon-button.Name|paper-icon-button||This element has a role of "button" but does not have a name available to an accessibility API. Valid names are: element content.|<paper-icon-button icon="search" class="style-scope traffic-incidents x-scope paper-icon-button-0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-disabled="false">...</paper-icon-button>

ERROR.error: This text input element does not have a name available to an accessibility API. Valid names are: label element, title attribute, aria-label attribute, aria-labelledby attribute.
ERROR.full_text: [HTMLCS] ERROR|WCAG2AA.Principle4.Guideline4_1.4_1_2.H91.InputText.Name|input|#searchBox|This text input element does not have a name available to an accessibility API. Valid names are: label element, title attribute, aria-label attribute, aria-labelledby attribute.|<input id="searchBox" placeholder="Search City" class="style-scope traffic-incidents"></input>

ERROR.error: This form field should be labelled in some way. Use the label element (either with a "for" attribute or wrapped around the form field), or "title", "aria-label" or "aria-labelledby" attributes as appropriate.
ERROR.full_text: [HTMLCS] ERROR|WCAG2AA.Principle1.Guideline1_3.1_3_1.F68|input|#searchBox|This form field should be labelled in some way. Use the label element (either with a "for" attribute or wrapped around the form field), or "title", "aria-label" or "aria-labelledby" attributes as appropriate.|<input id="searchBox" placeholder="Search City" class="style-scope traffic-incidents"></input>

NOTICE.error: Check that the title element describes the document.

WARNING.error: The web page should have the content's human language indicated in the markup
Text elements should have a reasonable contrast ratio

PASS.error: This element does not support ARIA roles, states and properties
Elements with ARIA roles must be in the correct scope
This element has an invalid ARIA attribute
ARIA state and property values must be valid
Elements with ARIA roles must use a valid, non-abstract ARIA role
Controls and media elements should have labels
These elements are focusable but either invisible or obscured by another element
Meaningful images should not be used in element backgrounds
The web page should have a title that describes topic or purpose
Elements with ARIA roles must have all required attributes for that role
Avoid positive integer values for tabIndex
This element has an unsupported ARIA attribute
